name: HelpArticle-ArticleVersions-GET-getArticleVersions
description: [Help Article] GET /articleVersions/{ID} — Retrieve an article version and the plain text content for the article version.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

name: HelpArticle-ArticleVersions-GET-getArticleVersions_1
description: [Help Article] GET /articleVersions — Retrieves a list of article versions and the plain text content within each article version.

schema.name: audience
schema.description: The audience of the article version.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: status
schema.description: The status of the article version.

name: HelpArticle-Values-GET-getAudiences
description: [Help Article] GET /values/common/audiences/ — Retrieves instances that can be used as values for other endpoint parameters in this service. Secured by: Help Article REST API, Set Up: Help Knowledge Management Scope: Help, People E

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default and maximum is 1000.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

name: HelpArticle-ArticleStatuses-GET-getArticleStatuses
description: [Help Article] GET /articleStatuses — Retrieves a list of article version statuses for all articles.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

name: HelpArticle-ArticleStatuses-GET-getArticleStatuses_1
description: [Help Article] GET /articleStatuses/{ID} — Retrieve an article version status for an article.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.
